column2: I loved my breakfast from this restaurant. I got the breakfast burrito and asked for it spicy. The portion was huge and there was so much flavor in every bite. I also enjoyed the Mexican chocolate. The nice spiced hot chocolate was a refreshing yet indulgent drink.
excellent sandwich and mango smoothie. i'm definitely coming back for more food.
delicious bfast. friendly and attentive staff. nice low key spot to get sandwiches and hot drinks without breaking the bank
Super nice staff. A bit pricey for breakfast. Had 2 egg sandwiches fresh juice and a coffee and it was over $40 for 2 people
The service is warm, the area is sketchy, and the food is hands down delicious. I tried a quesadilla here that I would gladly get again when in SF.

We had breakfast in this small neighborhood place. My girlfriend likes her coffee strong, and we were definitely in the right place for that. We both had the veggie quesadilla which was very delicious. Don't sleep on the salsa! Friendly people, good coffee, and reasonable prices made this a 5* experience for us
A great meal from the sweetest people. My breakfast burrito was hot, crispy and deliciously flavored. My latte smooth and rich. And again: kind personable staff. A little oasis.
Great breakfast sandwich and excellent coffee with amazing staff
Delicious breakfast burrito and friendly staff
Thank you, we appreciate that you liked it!!!
Excellent place for having breakfast in San Francisco. Very kind people in Tenderloin, around quiet homeless people. We recommend it whithout doubtes
The food was okay. Not very friendly staff. Not a very nice area
Food and coffee were both good, but previous reviews incorrect - *does not* have wifi.  Just wanted to correct that.
Delicious, authentic food at a great price.
Great little local cafe, all the essentials
Very good turkey ranch sandwich and equally good espresso. Super friendly Mexican family-owned venue.
Excellent Mexican breakfast!
Nice little cafeteria with some tasty breakfast menu

So glad they are in the neighborhood friendly, authentic hard working group if ladies. Each one nicer than the next. Happy to support THEM. If you are into breadpudding they occasionally have ine if the very best. Sooooo delish.
The chorizo breakfast burrito was amazing! And the habanero hot sauce has great flavour with a nice kick. Definitely would recommend.
Awesome little spot. great breakfast, fresh squeezed OJ. Perfect start to the day

Ignore "Paid to Post  Local Guide reviews  Their reviews are 'bunko" I live in the Neighbourhood, I formerly live in Tijuana and San Diego. I LOVE Un Cafecito, is is OUR TREASURE in OUR NEIGHBOURHOOD. We are the CHRONIC HOMELESS NOW HOUSED by Ed Lee's Initiave. Rich Uppity 'local guides" indeed, they are not Real Local 70 Years Old (Me) who Eats Health daily at Un Cafeto:
I got a avocado burrito and Mexican mocha for breakfast. It was perfect. The only concern I have is the location. It made me nervous to walk there at 7 AM.
This is my favorite coffee house in San Francisco.  The service and friendliness is unmatched.   This is a great mom and pop shop!
Great coffee and the breakfast burrito is excellent
My favorite are the Mangoladas!!! and veggie sandwhich ----Mi favorito cafecito en SF. This was my go-to when I worked next door at The Arlington.
Great neighborhood coffee shop with great sandwiches and a large ice cream counter. Indoor and outdoor seating.   Really nice and courteous staff/owners.
They have the best Asiago Cheese Bagel and the best customer service. When a place has good food and service they will never stop seeing my face.
Great little restaraunt with a nice atmosphere, friendly service, and excellent breakfast burittos. Would recommend for a quick stop.
Great cafe!
Great place coffee is strong and it has flavor and all the food is great they also sell icecream and other mexican treats
Their food and drinks are really good! Not only do they have the usual cafe foods, they also have some Latino food choices!
I got the butter bagel with a small reg coffee. The place is small but friendly.
It is a really nice restaurant with a really friendly staff and as always clean and you just feel like you’re in home
The breakfast burrito was stuffed with ham, egg, and cheese and the staff was nice too. Will be back again.
I love this cafe! Their food is excellent and the ladies are very attentive to their costumer's!
Excellent croissant, and latte. Quickly prepared and served.
The workers should learn to say thank you and you’re welcome. They are rude
I loved that place! Nothing fancy but really awesome food!
generous breakfast in this warmfull place
The girls are really nice. Food was delicious. Very happy
maximum 3 stars 50% items on the menu are out of stock
Great coffee and breakfast burrito. The hot sauce is a great wake up!
They are the nicest people and I love their breakfast burrito
Excellent coffee and very tasty breakfast options.
They where very nice and they told my girl friend she looked pretty
Went today during it's operating hours and it was closed?
Best place to grab affordable breakfast in the TL love it.
Burrito was excellent and friendly staff, might get slow if crowded
People are nice, and the breakfast burrito is awesome!
Good espresso and great breakfast burritos
Super nice ladies and the mango smoothie was to die for
Best place to grab breakfast on the go!
Great coffee and friendly service.
Awesome food to start your day right
Best fresh juices and very friendly
Great people and food!
Very nice little  coffee shop
spacious.  free WiFi.
Nice
Gumballs

Cafecito is a good place for a quick breakfast, the service is good and the prices are normal for SF. It is a small but cozy place. Food is of good quality and tastes good. They need to complement with child seats and the area may have a different vibe due to the homeless on the street but in reality nothing happens, they are on their roll.
Very good sandwiches! Excellent taste, music and attention Thanks!
Thank you very much for your comment, we are here to serve you.
Spacious and good coffee
The tamale was very tasty and the girls who serve are very nice! Plenty of tables to sit inside and outside.
Breakfast with homemade biscuit or sendiwich. Interesting prices and quality. In the area there are several beggars.
Tasty breakfast at reasonable prices - very rare in this city
The meals that are roasted there are very tasty 👍👍👍
Very good, I recommend the carnitas sandwich
Good place, nice attention, I recommend it😉😋
Excellent attention and food. I recommend it😊
I prefer @corazon happy

Very delicious the meals are recommended the carnitas and burritas and tacos of carnitas and sandwich are delicious
